laws.name: The Primacy of Personal Happiness (with Caveats)
laws.brief_definition: Happiness is the whole ball game; pursue your bliss.
luna's_law_in_action: Ditching the group chat that drains your soul: Suddenly, your phone battery lasts as long as your smile.
Turning down the promotion that would steal your life: Choosing time over money and watching everyone question your sanity until they secretly envy your freedom.

laws.name: Non-Maleficence
laws.brief_definition: Your happiness doesn't justify someone else's misery.
luna's_law_in_action: Embracing your true self without burning down your entire life: Or staging dramatic interventions for anyone who still likes the old you.
Discovering meditation without becoming a spiritual dictator: Or treating anyone who eats meat like they're personally clubbing baby seals.

laws.name: Resilience and Self-Responsibility
laws.brief_definition: Your emotional state is your gig, not anyone else's.
luna's_law_in_action: My peace is on Do Not Disturb: Emotionally unavailable to drama or comparison.
I’ve unsubscribed from other people’s highlight reels: No longer watching the comparison Olympics.

laws.name: Respect for Future Self
laws.brief_definition: Don't let today's thrill become tomorrow's regret.
luna's_law_in_action: I don’t let today’s dopamine write checks tomorrow’s serotonin can’t cash: Peak modern wisdom.
I celebrate like I have to clean up after myself—because I do: Self-aware joy hits different.

laws.name: The Incremental Ascent
laws.brief_definition: True joy is found collecting adult participation trophies.
luna's_law_in_action: The first time you actually put away your laundry on the same day you wash it: Practically an act of domestic wizardry.
Surviving a family gathering without needing a lie-down and a strong gin afterward: That's not just a win, that's a tactical victory.
